text:
UK started its mass vaccination drive on 8th Dec, 2020. 2.6 million people vaccinated so far. Yesterday UK had 1,564 #COVID19 deaths. Highest single day deaths so far.

Don't get overexcited by #Vaccine news, it takes time to protect you. Mask & Social distancing r indispensable. https://t.co/B3qwvtVvCi
